selectView:
select  a.RPTNO,f.userid
from RPT_DEFINE a 
  left join USER_RPTFILE_RIGHT b on a.RPTNO= b.RESOURCEID
  
  left join USER_ROLE c on  b.operatorid=c.role_id
  left join  user_role_map f on c.role_id=f.role_id
  

   union all   
 
 select  a.RPTNO,f.userid
  from RPT_DEFINE a 
  left join USER_RPTFILE_RIGHT b on a.RPTNO= b.RESOURCEID
  
 left join USER_ROLE c on  b.operatorid=c.role_id
  left join  GROUP_ROLE_MAP d on c.role_id=d.ROLE_ID
    left join user_group e on d.group_id=e.group_id
 left join   user_group_map f on e.group_id=f.group_id
  
  where RPTNO !='ROOT' and PARENTID!='ROOT'  and d.GROUP_ID is not null  and userid not like ('8a84c9c%')
  order by RPTNO
